price: 5. Waxaan dhab ahaan ku qurxinnay samada dhow nalal (xiddigo), Waxaana ka dhignay (xiddigahaa) gantaallo lagu gano shayaadiinta2, waxaanuna u diyaarinnay cadaab Naar hureysa.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ زَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِمَصَٰبِيحَ وَجَعَلۡنَٰهَا رُجُومٗا لِّلشَّيَٰطِينِۖ وَأَعۡتَدۡنَا لَهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلسَّعِيرِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad zayyannā al-samāa al-dun'yā bimaṣābīḥa wajaʿalnāhā rujūman lilshayāṭīni wa-aʿtadnā lahum ʿadhāba al-saʿīri
